disclaimer: These practices are presented for educational and cultural preservation purposes. They represent African American folk magic traditions passed down through generations.

categories.road_opening: Practices to remove obstacles, create new opportunities, and clear blocked paths
categories.ancestor_work: Honoring and communicating with ancestors for guidance and protection
categories.money_stability: Drawing prosperity, financial stability, and abundance
categories.cleansing: Spiritual cleansing, removing negativity, and purification
categories.love: Practices for self-love, attracting love, and relationship harmony
categories.protection: Spiritual protection, warding, and safety practices
categories.justice: Practices for fairness, legal matters, and balance

items.title: Road Opener Floor Wash
items.description: A traditional floor wash made with road-opening herbs to clear obstacles from your path and open doors to new opportunities.
items.best_timing: Waning moon for removing blocks, waxing moon for drawing opportunities
instructions: Steep herbs in boiled water overnight
Strain and add Florida Water and splash of ammonia
Mop from back of home to front door
Dispose of water at a crossroads if possible
items.intentions: Clear my path, remove all obstacles, open all doors of opportunity before me
items.notes: Traditional practice is to mop moving toward the front door to push obstacles out

items.title: Crossroads Petition
items.description: Taking a petition or request to a physical crossroads, a powerful liminal space in hoodoo tradition associated with choices and new paths.
items.tradition: African American folk magic with African origins
ingredients: Offering (coins, small amount of rum or whiskey)
items.best_timing: Midnight, dawn, or when facing a significant decision
instructions: Write your petition clearly
Anoint with road opener oil
Go to a physical crossroads
Leave offering at center
Bury or leave petition
Walk away without looking back
items.intentions: At the crossroads of possibility, I choose the path of success and blessing
items.notes: The crossroads represents where the physical and spiritual worlds meet

items.title: Key Charm for Opening Doors
items.description: An old skeleton key dressed with oils and carried to open metaphorical doors in your life - jobs, relationships, housing.
items.best_timing: Make on a Wednesday (associated with opportunities) or during waxing moon
instructions: Cleanse the key with Florida Water
Anoint with road opener and Crown of Success oils
Hold and pray your petition over it
Carry in red flannel bag or pocket
items.intentions: This key opens every door that is meant for me
items.notes: Feed weekly with a drop of oil to keep it working

items.title: Ancestor Altar Setup
items.description: Creating a dedicated space to honor ancestors, receive their guidance, and maintain spiritual connection with those who came before.
items.best_timing: Set up during ancestor-focused times or when beginning ancestor work
instructions: Choose elevated location (ancestors should be above floor level)
Cover with white cloth
Place glass of clear water
Add white candle
Include photos facing you
Add personal items they loved
items.intentions: I honor those who came before me and invite their loving guidance
items.notes: Change water weekly, light candle when speaking to them

items.title: Ancestor Elevation Prayer
items.description: A practice of praying for the spiritual elevation of ancestors, which in turn strengthens their ability to assist you.
items.best_timing: Mondays, or any day you feel called
instructions: Light white candle at ancestor altar
Refresh the water glass
Speak their names aloud
Pray for their peace and elevation
Share updates about your life
Ask for their guidance
items.intentions: May my ancestors rise in light, and may they guide me with their wisdom
items.notes: Elevated ancestors are stronger helpers - this is mutual benefit work

items.title: Ancestor Money Burning
items.description: Burning joss paper or ancestor money to send spiritual currency to ancestors, a practice adopted from Chinese tradition into some hoodoo practice.
items.best_timing: During ancestor veneration days, new moon, or when asking for help
instructions: Set intention for which ancestors receive this
Light money in fireproof container
Speak their names as it burns
Thank them for their continued presence
Allow to burn completely
items.intentions: I send this with love to those who came before me, may they prosper in the spirit world
items.notes: Some practitioners do this monthly or before asking ancestors for major help

items.title: Money Drawing Bath
items.description: A spiritual bath using money-drawing herbs to attract financial prosperity and abundance into your life.
items.best_timing: Thursday (Jupiter's day) or during waxing moon
instructions: Steep herbs in hot water to make strong tea
Strain and add to bath water
Add small amount of honey
Place coins in bath
Soak while visualizing money flowing to you
Air dry if possible
Keep the coins as a charm
items.intentions: Money flows to me easily and abundantly from expected and unexpected sources
items.notes: Take bath upward from feet to head to draw money to you

items.title: Prosperity Rice Jar
items.description: A jar spell combining rice (abundance) with money-drawing herbs and a lodestone to continuously attract prosperity.
items.best_timing: Thursday or Sunday, waxing moon
instructions: Fill jar halfway with rice
Add cinnamon and money-drawing herbs
Place lodestone in center
Sprinkle magnetic sand
Fold dollar bill toward you, add to jar
Seal and burn green candle on top
Shake regularly to activate
items.intentions: Like rice multiplies, so does my wealth and abundance
items.notes: Feed the lodestone weekly with magnetic sand

items.title: Wallet Dressing
items.description: Preparing your wallet with specific items and oils to attract and keep money in your possession.
items.best_timing: New wallet or when refreshing money magic
instructions: Clean out wallet completely
Anoint corners with money drawing oil
Write money wish on bay leaf, place inside
Add small cinnamon stick
Include whole nutmeg or lucky hand root
Never let wallet be completely empty
items.intentions: My wallet attracts and holds money, my resources multiply
items.notes: Always keep at least one bill as 'seed money'

items.title: Spiritual Cleansing Bath
items.description: A bath to remove negative energy, crossed conditions, and spiritual heaviness, leaving you refreshed and protected.
items.best_timing: Waning moon, Saturday, or when feeling spiritually heavy
instructions: Make strong tea from hyssop and rue
Add to bath with salt and lemon juice
Light white candle in bathroom
Bathe from head to toe, washing downward
Pray for cleansing as you bathe
Dispose of a portion of water at crossroads
items.intentions: I release all that does not serve me, I am cleansed and renewed
items.notes: Recite Psalm 51 while bathing for traditional practice

items.title: Egg Cleansing (Limpia)
items.description: Using a raw egg to absorb negative energy from the body, a practice shared across many folk magic traditions.
items.best_timing: When feeling attacked or heavy, any time needed
instructions: Pray over egg to empower it
Roll egg over entire body, head to toe
Focus extra time on areas that feel heavy
Crack egg into glass of water
Read the egg for signs
Dispose of egg at crossroads or flush
Do not eat the egg
items.intentions: This egg absorbs all negativity from my being
items.notes: Bubbles, blood spots, or unusual shapes in the egg indicate what was removed

items.title: Chinese Wash Floor Cleaning
items.description: A powerful cleansing wash for floors and surfaces that removes crossed conditions and unwanted spiritual residue from the home.
items.best_timing: Waning moon, when moving into new home, after arguments or illness
instructions: Add ingredients to mop water
Start from back of home
Mop toward front door
Wipe door frame and threshold
Dispose of dirty water away from home
Follow with protective floor wash if desired
items.intentions: I cleanse this space of all negativity and crossed conditions
items.notes: Chinese Wash gets its name from being sold in shops, not from Chinese origin

items.title: Honey Jar for Sweet Relationships
items.description: A classic hoodoo working to sweeten someone toward you, whether for romance, friendship, or professional relationships.
items.best_timing: Friday (Venus day), waxing moon, full moon
instructions: Write target's name 3 times
Turn paper, write your name 3 times crossing theirs
Write your desire around names in circle
Add personal concerns
Fold toward you
Push into honey jar
Burn candle on top regularly
items.intentions: May [name]'s thoughts and feelings toward me be sweet
items.notes: Speak sweetly to your target as you work this - your actions should match

items.title: Self-Love Mirror Work
items.description: A ritual using a mirror to strengthen self-love, self-worth, and attract love by first loving yourself.
items.best_timing: Friday, waxing moon, or whenever self-love is needed
instructions: Cleanse mirror with rose water
Light pink candle
Look into your own eyes in mirror
Speak affirmations of love and worth
Anoint your heart with rose oil
Do for seven consecutive days
items.intentions: I am worthy of love, I attract love because I love myself
items.notes: This work must be consistent - self-love is a practice

items.title: Come to Me Working
items.description: Traditional work to draw a specific person to you or to attract new love into your life.
items.best_timing: Friday, waxing to full moon
instructions: Dress red candle with Come to Me oil
Place lodestone on target's photo/name
Light candle on top
Call the person's name and your desire
Let candle burn while focused on intention
Repeat for seven days
items.intentions: [Name], come to me with love and desire
items.notes: This work is for drawing, not controlling - respect free will

items.title: Protection Salt Line
items.description: Using salt to create a protective barrier that negative entities and energies cannot cross.
items.best_timing: Waning moon to banish, any time for protection
instructions: Mix salt with protective intention
Lay unbroken line across thresholds
Circle around property if possible
Replace after rain or regular foot traffic
Can add to protective floor wash
items.intentions: This line of salt bars all evil and negativity from entering
items.notes: An unbroken line is important - repair any breaks immediately

items.title: Mirror Box for Return to Sender
items.description: A defensive working that reflects negative energy, curses, or ill-wishes back to the sender.
items.best_timing: Waning moon, Saturday
instructions: Line inside of box with mirrors facing inward
Write attacker's name on paper
Place paper inside mirrored box
Anoint with reversing oil
Close box and seal
Burn black candle on top
Hide or bury box
items.intentions: All negativity sent to me returns to its source
items.notes: This is defensive work, not offensive - it only returns what was sent

items.title: Fiery Wall of Protection
items.description: Creating a powerful spiritual shield around yourself or your home that burns away all negative approaches.
items.best_timing: Tuesday (Mars day), waning moon to banish threats
instructions: Mix brick dust, salt, and dragonsblood
Lay line across threshold
Anoint doors and windows with Fiery Wall oil
Light red candle and pray protection psalm
Renew monthly or after feeling threatened
items.intentions: I am surrounded by a wall of divine fire that burns all evil before it reaches me
items.notes: Psalm 91 is traditionally used with this work

items.title: Court Case Winning Work
items.description: Traditional hoodoo work for success in legal matters, court cases, and dealings with authority.
items.best_timing: Thursday (Jupiter/justice), before court date
instructions: Write case details on brown paper
Anoint with Court Case oil
Chew Little John root, spit toward courthouse (or in direction)
Carry deer's tongue in shoe when in court
Burn purple candle dressed with oil
Dress in clean, dignified clothing
items.intentions: Justice is served in my favor, truth is revealed, I am vindicated
items.notes: Also consult with legal professionals - magic supports mundane effort

items.title: Commanding and Compelling
items.description: Work to compel others to act fairly, speak truth, or make just decisions in your favor.
items.best_timing: Tuesday or Thursday
instructions: Write target's name three times
Cross with your command written
Anoint with Commanding oil
Dress purple candle and burn on paper
Speak your command firmly
Carry licorice root when dealing with person
items.intentions: [Name], you will [specific just action], you have no choice but fairness
items.notes: Use for justice and fairness, not malicious control

items.title: Stop Gossip and Lies
items.description: Work to silence those who spread falsehoods about you and protect your reputation.
items.best_timing: Waning moon, Saturday
instructions: Slice tongue to create pocket
Write enemy's name on paper
Fill with alum, pepper, slippery elm
Pin mouth shut with nine pins
Soak in vinegar
Freeze to stop their speech
items.intentions: [Name], your lies freeze on your tongue, you cannot speak against me
items.notes: This is defensive work against actual harmful gossip

items.title: Healing Candle Vigil
items.description: A focused healing prayer using candle magic to direct healing energy toward yourself or another.
items.best_timing: Waxing moon for bringing health, Sunday
instructions: Dress candle with healing oil
Place on photo or name paper
Surround with healing herbs
Light and pray for specific healing
Burn for set time daily for seven days
Visualize person in perfect health
items.intentions: [Name] is healed, whole, and restored to perfect health
items.notes: Never replace medical treatment - this supports healing

items.title: Uncrossing Spiritual Work
items.description: Removing crossed conditions, hexes, curses, or jinxes that have been placed on you.
items.best_timing: Waning moon, Saturday
instructions: Take uncrossing bath for seven nights
Burn black candle dressed with uncrossing oil each night
Recite Psalm 37
On seventh night, dispose of candle remains at crossroads
Follow with protection work
items.intentions: All crossed conditions are removed from me, I walk free and clear
items.notes: After uncrossing, immediately put up protection

items.title: Peaceful Home Conjure
items.description: Work to restore peace, harmony, and healing to a troubled household.
items.best_timing: Friday, waxing moon, or after household conflict
instructions: Make Peace Water (water, lavender, sugar, salt, bluing)
Sprinkle in every room
Place white flowers on altar or center table
Burn blue candles throughout home
Speak peace over each room
items.intentions: Peace dwells in this home, love fills every room, harmony prevails
items.notes: All household members should ideally participate or agree

items.title: Road Opening Candle Spell
items.description: A focused candle working to remove specific obstacles and open new pathways in life.
items.best_timing: Wednesday, waxing moon
instructions: Write obstacle on paper
Cross it out and write desired path over it
Dress candle with Road Opener oil
Roll in Abre Camino herb
Burn on top of petition
Visualize path clearing
items.intentions: All obstacles are removed, my path is clear, doors open before me
items.notes: Be specific about what you're opening the road to

items.title: Four Thieves Vinegar Protection
items.description: A legendary protective formula that wards off illness, evil, and enemies.
items.best_timing: Make on Saturday, steep for four weeks
instructions: Add all herbs and garlic to vinegar
Steep in dark place for 4 weeks
Strain and bottle
Sprinkle around property for protection
Add to bath for personal protection
Use in floor wash to protect home
items.intentions: This vinegar protects me from all harm, illness, and evil
items.notes: Legend says thieves used this to rob plague victims without getting sick

items.title: Mojo Hand for Success
items.description: A traditional flannel bag containing items that work together for ongoing success and prosperity.
items.best_timing: Thursday or Sunday, waxing moon
instructions: Cleanse all items with Florida Water
Assemble while praying your petition
Add personal concern last
Anoint with Crown of Success oil
Breathe life into it
Feed weekly with oil
Carry on person or in bag
items.intentions: This hand works constantly for my success and prosperity
items.notes: Mojo bags are living things - feed them and don't let others touch them

items.title: Ancestor Feast Offering
items.description: Preparing and offering a meal to ancestors to strengthen connection and show gratitude.
ingredients: Small portions on a white plate
items.best_timing: Death anniversaries, holidays, or when seeking connection
instructions: Cook their favorite meal with love
Set a place at table for them
Plate small portions of everything
Pour fresh water
Light white candle
Speak to them as if present
Leave plate overnight, dispose next day
items.intentions: I feed my ancestors in gratitude and love, may they feast and be satisfied
items.notes: Share family news, ask for guidance, maintain relationship

items.title: Break Up and Move Away Work
items.description: Defensive work to remove a harmful person from your life by breaking their attachment to you and encouraging them to move on.
items.best_timing: Waning moon, Saturday
instructions: Cut lemon in half
Write name, fold with peppers, vinegar
Close lemon with pins
Burn black candle dressed with hot foot powder
Bury away from your home
Sprinkle hot foot powder where they walk
items.intentions: [Name] moves away from me, our paths no longer cross
items.notes: Use for genuine protection, not petty disputes

items.title: Lucky Hand Gambling Charm
items.description: Creating a lucky charm specifically for games of chance and gambling luck.
items.best_timing: Thursday, waxing moon, or before gambling
instructions: Dress Lucky Hand root with Fast Luck oil
Add five finger grass and nutmeg to green bag
Add the dressed root
Anoint outside of bag
Carry when gambling
Feed with oil and your saliva
items.intentions: Luck is in my hands, fortune favors my plays
items.notes: Do not gamble more than you can afford to lose - this aids luck, doesn't guarantee it

items.title: Steady Work Spell
items.description: Work to secure stable employment, keep your job, and maintain good relationships at work.
ingredients: Your business card or pay stub
items.best_timing: Thursday or Sunday
instructions: Dress green candle with Steady Work oil
Write job-keeping petition on paper
Place lodestone on your business card
Burn candle on top
Carry gravel root to work
Anoint shoes before work daily
items.intentions: My position is secure, I am valued, my work brings abundance
items.notes: Combine with excellent work ethic and professionalism

items.title: Reconciliation Sugar Jar
items.description: Work to sweeten feelings and restore a relationship after conflict or separation.
items.best_timing: Friday, waxing moon
instructions: Write names crossed on paper
Add rose petals and lavender to jar
Push paper into sugar
Dress pink candle with Reconciliation oil
Burn on jar while speaking reconciliation
Burn weekly until reconciled
items.intentions: The sweetness between us returns, we forgive and reconnect
items.notes: Both parties should genuinely want reconciliation

items.title: Spiritual Armor Dressing
items.description: Daily practice of spiritually dressing yourself for protection before facing the world.
items.best_timing: Every morning before leaving home
instructions: Anoint forehead, heart, hands, and feet with protection oil
Spray or dab Florida Water on pulse points
Recite Psalm 91 or personal protection prayer
Carry protective charm
Visualize armor of light surrounding you
items.intentions: I am protected throughout this day, no harm reaches me
items.notes: Consistency is key - make this a daily practice

items.title: Break Jinx Bath Series
items.description: A series of baths to systematically remove jinxed conditions and restore good fortune.
items.best_timing: Begin on Saturday, continue for seven nights through waning moon
instructions: Take bath each night for 7 nights
Each night, wash downward to remove negativity
Light white candle during each bath
Wear white after bathing
On night 7, dress in new white clothes
Dispose of final bath water at crossroads
items.intentions: With each bath, I release more negativity. By day seven, I am free
items.notes: Follow immediately with protective work

items.title: Block Buster Work
items.description: Powerful work to break through major obstacles and blockages that other work hasn't removed.
items.best_timing: Waning moon for destroying blocks, Saturday
instructions: Write obstacle on paper
Dress black candle to destroy obstacle
Dress red candle for power to overcome
Burn black candle on petition until gone
Light red candle to replace what was destroyed
Visualize obstacle shattering
items.intentions: All blocks are shattered, all obstacles crumble, nothing stands in my way
items.notes: This is for serious blocks - use regular road opener work first

items.title: Crown of Success Dressing
items.description: Using Crown of Success oil to draw success in all endeavors and rise to the top.
items.best_timing: Sunday, waxing moon
instructions: Anoint head with Crown of Success oil
Carry bay leaf anointed with oil
Dress yellow/gold candle and burn when needing success
Anoint important documents
Add to bath before important events
items.intentions: Success crowns all my efforts, I rise to the top
items.notes: Works for job interviews, exams, business dealings

items.title: Stop Nightmares Charm
items.description: Protection against bad dreams, night terrors, and spiritual attack during sleep.
items.best_timing: Before bed, especially after nightmares begin
instructions: Combine anise, lavender in white bag
Add protective symbol (cross, eye, etc.)
Sprinkle with holy water
Place under pillow
Pray for peaceful sleep
Dispose of nightmares into bag each morning
items.intentions: I sleep in peace, my dreams are protected, nightmares have no power
items.notes: Can also place Bible under pillow

items.title: Truth and Justice Petition
items.description: Formal petition work to bring hidden truth to light and ensure justice is served.
items.best_timing: Thursday, court days, or when justice is needed
instructions: Write situation in purple ink
Be specific about what justice looks like
Anoint petition with Justice oil
Place scale symbol on top
Burn purple candle on petition
Release to divine justice
items.intentions: Truth is revealed, justice is served, balance is restored
items.notes: Trust divine timing - justice comes in its own time

items.title: Binding to Prevent Harm
items.description: Binding someone who means you harm so they cannot act against you.
items.best_timing: Waning to dark moon, Saturday
instructions: Write name on paper or use photo
Wrap tightly with black thread
As you wrap, state binding intention
Seal with black candle wax
Wrap in black cloth
Bury or hide in your space
items.intentions: [Name], you are bound from harming me in any way
items.notes: This is defensive - binding their harmful actions, not their whole being

items.title: Drawing Love Oil Blend
items.description: Creating a personal love-drawing oil to anoint candles, wear, and use in love work.
items.best_timing: Friday, waxing moon, with intention
instructions: Warm base oil gently
Add herbs one by one with prayer
Add pinch of sugar for sweetness
Include tiny lodestone to draw love
Steep for two weeks in dark place
Strain and bottle
Use on candles, body, or items
items.intentions: This oil draws true love to me, sweetens hearts toward me
items.notes: Store in dark glass bottle, use within one year
